definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: scatter (usually regarded as secondary form of [[בזר]] q.v.; NH id. Pi. (opp. [[כנס]] = [[כנשׁ]]), Niph.; Ar. fazara rend, slit, also separate, disperse);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. pass. f. [[שֶׂה פְזוּרָה]] Je 50:17 a scattered sheep is Israel (i.e. driven off, isolated).

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[נִפְזְרוּ]] Ps 141:7 our bones are scattered [[לִפִי שְׁאוֹל]].

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[פִּזַּר]] Ps 53:6, Ps 112:9, etc.; Impf. 3 ms. [[יְפַזֵּר]] Ps 147:16; 2 fs. [[וַתְּפַזְּרִי]] Je 3:13; Pt. [[מְפַזֵּר]] Pr 11:24; —scatter Ps 89:11, Ps 53:6, Ps 147:16 (all subj. ´[[י]]), Joe 4:2; obj. [[דְּרָכַיִךְ]] Je 3:13, of Isr. running hither and thither to strange gods; abs. of spending money Ps 112:9 (alms), Pr 11:24.
